meanings.definition: To have made a sudden movement or gesture of disgust or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: She yeuked when she saw the slimy bug on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The smell of the garbage made him yeuked and cover his nose.
meanings.sent3: The spoiled milk yeuked her so much that she couldn't even look at it.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie scene yeuked her as if she had seen a ghost.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine yeuked her taste buds for hours.

meanings.definition: To have caused someone to feel disgusted or uncomfortable.
meanings.sent1: The rotten food in the fridge yeuked everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: His rude comment yeuked her and ruined the mood of the party.
meanings.sent3: The prank he played yeuked his friends, but they all laughed later.
meanings.sent4: The creepy doll he brought home yeuked his little sister to tears.
meanings.sent5: The dirty joke he told yeuked the entire class, but they couldn't stop laughing.
